DOC.brief_summary: To examine cognitive metabolic effect probiotic supplement readily already available purchase public drug store . This study double-blinded randomize cross-over placebo-controlled intervention study . Participants randomize receive either probiotic supplement placebo first intervention period last 2 week . This follow washout period , proceed second intervention period , also last 2 week also follow washout period .
DOC.criteria: Male Age 1828y Healthy ( selfreported ) medication Nonsmoking Normal sleepwake rhythm ( i.e . 78 h per night , selfreported via diary ) Regular meal pattern daily breakfast Major illness Taking serious medication Any sleep condition ( e.g . irregular bedtime , sleep complaint ) Any dietary issue food item provide Current history endocrine , neurological psychiatric disorder Shift work precede three month long duration Time travel significant number time zone precede two month Too much weight gain weight loss precede three month Excessive intake ferment dairy product Intake probiotic Recent antibiotic treatment ( last 6 month ) Recent intake certain dietary supplement Excessive caffeine ( > 5 cup daily ) alcohol intake ( > 2 alcohol unit daily )
